review:
We have been meeting this doctor for my kid and niece. It's been now 8 years since we know him. He advises minimal medicine. No extra test until and unless it's really required.
I have visited many good doctors in Bangalore *** * **** *** *** ******I give him 100 out of 100.

** ** **** ***** I visited for my daughter's eye infection checkup. Doctor behaviour was very good and he listened to our problems. There was too long waiting time. When it comes to improvement, they have to maintain proper timing in outside reception. Got to know about this doctor from one of my colleague. I would like to recommend this doctor to others and I would like to give a rating of 5/5.
It's a nice and soothing experience I had. Doc took time to understand and look in depth.Made us to understand the issue and get it recognize we definitely will say thanks.

The doctor needs rest..He was very low and we could not hear a word he said. Unfriendly. ****** *** ** ** * ********** ******* ***** *** ******** * ****** Picked him for his experience on Practo. *** ***** **** *** ****** ******* ***** **** ***** Needs energy to attend the patients. Sorry he might be an amazing doctor. But didnâ€™t help us well.

review: We have been visiting Dr.Khatib for more than 10 years for any pediatric consultation in my family. ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ****** **** *** *** ** very direct and to the point. No un-necessary tests or medications *** **** ********** I trust him with my kids health anytime.
He's an amazing doctor and knows what he's speaking. I trust him a lot. He's an expert and it shows. His kind words reassures you even when things are not great...I would recommend him any time

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Salim Khatib is genuine, no beating around the bush, talks straight to the point and doesn't commercialize his profession. This should explain it all.
